778360.name: Love or Loved - A Bullet For My Valentine
778360.description:
关于 / About

爱或爱是一个多人射击和战斗竞技场游戏。这是一个上瘾的多人游戏，第三人称，FPS，大逃杀和IO游戏混合元素。
“爱或爱 - 我的情人的子弹”是游戏的第一阶段，特别是主题为情人节，包括人物，武器，游戏模式等。
“爱情或爱 - 我的情人的子弹”将在情人节（2月7 - 14日）期间举办独特的游戏模式活动，之后游戏和世界将扩大到涵盖更多的地图，故事，武器和主题射击和Brawling竞技场比赛。
===English===
Love or Loved is a multiplayer Shooting and Fighting Arena game. It's a addictive multiplayer game with mixed elements from Third-Person, FPS, Battle Royale and IO games.
"Love or Loved - A Bullet For My Valentine" is the first phase of the game, specially themed to Valentines Day, including characters, weapons, game modes, etc.
"Love or Loved - A Bullet For My Valentine" will have unique Game Mode Events during the Valentines Week (7-14th Feb), after which the gameplay and the world will be expanded to cover more maps, story, weapons and match the theme of a Shooting and Brawling Arena game.

特征 / Features

- 动漫风格的人物与有趣的地图
- 快节奏的动作拍摄和Meele竞技场游戏
- 单人和在线多人
- 多个字符和地图玩
- 有趣的游戏模式
- 专用服务器，从一开始
- 不支付2 - 赢
- LAG FREE（专用服务器可用于多个地区，如NA，EU和亚洲）
- 实际的工作/ AI（服务器可以填充空机器人点，直到更多的玩家加入，所以你不必一个人玩:)
===English===
- Anime-style characters with interesting maps
- Shooting and Meele Arena Game with fast paced action
- Single Player and Online Multi-Player
-Multiple Characters and Maps to play
-Interesting Game Modes
- Dedicated Servers, right from the start
- NOT PAY-2-WIN
- LAG FREE (dedicated servers available in multiple regions like NA, EU and Asia)
- ACTUAL WORKING BOTS/AI (Server can fill empty player spots with bots till more players join, so you don't have to play alone :)

------------------------------------
即将推出的功能 / Upcoming Features

- 互动地图
- COOP和派对模式（多人）
- 跨平台支持
- 基于服务器的事件系统（老板的战斗，陷阱，如MMORPGs等）
- 与主题扩展包的故事模式入侵
===English===
- Interactive Maps
- COOP and Party Mode (Multiplayer)
- Cross-Platform support
- Server-based Event System (Boss Battles, traps, etc. like MMORPGs)
- Story Mode Invasions with Themed Expansion Packs

---------------------
控制 / Controls
- WASD移动
- 鼠标左键拍摄
- 右键点击缩放/目标
- 选项卡或1-2-3循环通过武器
- 空间跳跃
- Shift / Ctrl到Dash
===English===
- WASD to move
- Left Mouse Button to shoot
- Right click to Zoom/Aim
- Tab or 1-2-3 to cycle through weapons
- Space to Jump
- Shift/Ctrl to Dash
